articles.title: Yellowstone volcano hit by 351 earthquakes in just two weeks 'No need to freak out' - Daily Express
articles.description: YELLOWSTONE volcano was rocked by more than 300 earthquakes in the last two weeks alone, with geologists monitoring multiple swarm events across the US national park.
